title: Talking WWDC and M2 with Tim Millet and Bob Borchers!
description:
This week, Marques and Andrew recap their trip to Cupertino for WWDC, PLUS an interview with Apple VP's Tim Millet and Bob Borchers! Special thanks to Apple for inviting out, and for coming on the show!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Marques and Andrew talk MacBook Air, CarPlay, and M2.
